data.actual_result: Emoji don't show up on frequently used
data.expected_result: Emoji show up on frequently used since you used them
data.short_description: Emoji picker doesn't update frequently used if typing out the emoji instead of using the emoji picker
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure your frequently used emoji aren't very full - Type out an emote without using the emoji picker - Open the emoji picker and observe the frequently used - You can also spam an emoji if your frequently used is full
